# dataRepresentation

**Instance Property**

A raw representation of the record’s data.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataRepresentation: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The data’s format varies based on its [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKVerifiableClinicalRecord/sourceType]:





## Accessing the Raw Payload

- **jwsRepresentation**: A raw representation of the SMART Health Card’s contents.
